entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:54 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 11:38 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -2.6°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -4.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
